mapper.insert: insert into st_user_group_point_his( group_id, point_type , point_balance , register_number, accept_person, accept_date ) values ( #{groupId}, #{pointType}, #{pointBalance}, #{registerNumber}, #{acceptPerson}, #{acceptDate} )
mapper.select: select point_id, group_id, point_type , point_balance , register_number, accept_person, accept_date from st_user_group_point_his where group_id =#{groupId}
